body:
So `libfabric` already exists in Spack, and it appears Intel MPI >= 2019 now requires `libfabric`, so it seems it will need to be listed as a dependency for `intel-mpi`. I'm not sure the best way to do this with the Intel packages, but I thought I would make this issue to document it.

https://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/intel-mpi-library-2019-over-libfabric
title: Intel MPI 2019 requires libfabric
